title: SpaceX and ULA win military launch competition worth $653 million -- and that's just the start
description: Elon Musk's SpaceX and Boeing-Lockheed Martin joint venture United Launch Alliance are the big winners in a stiff competition to secure military launch contracts, teeing up the companies to dominate the lucrative market for launching US national security satellites for years to come.

title: Ronaldo can't save Juventus in return to Champions League action
description: Cristiano Ronaldo's brace was not enough to fire Juventus into the Champions League quarterfinals as European football's most prestigious cup competition returned in style on Friday.

title: What we can learn from Covid-19 for the climate crisis
description: CNN's Bill Weir explores what we can learn from Covid-19 to better prepare for the impact of the climate crisis.

title: In a heated exchange, CNN's Poppy Harlow confronts Trump's top economic adviser
description: If you get paid more to stay at home than go to work, why would you go to work?

title: School reverses student's suspension for posting photo of crowded school hallway
US to end deployment of US Marines in Norway after boosting it in 2018 amid Russian tensions
description: The US is ending the rotational deployment of some 700 US Marines to Norway, shifting to shorter more periodic deployments and focusing on training with the US Navy, a move that comes days after the Pentagon announced a major draw down of troops in Europe.

title: Brent Scowcroft, longtime Bush confidant and former national security adviser, dies at 95
description: Brent Scowcroft, a former national security adviser and longtime confidant of former President George H.W. Bush, has died, a spokesman for the 41st president's foundation said Friday. He was 95.

title: TikTok: Is the security threat real?
description: Video sharing app TikTok is experiencing record-setting growth. But now it could be banned in the US. CNN Business explains why politicians fear TikTok's automatic data collection could prove a national security threat.

title: Judge rules E. Jean Carroll can continue to seek Trump's DNA in defamation suit
description: A New York state Supreme Court judge on Thursday denied President Donald Trump's effort to delay the proceedings in a defamation lawsuit filed against him by longtime magazine columnist E. Jean Carroll, a move that allows her to pursue his DNA sample in an effort to prove claims he sexually assaulted her in the 1990s.

title: When an elephant lost her leg, he invented a prosthesis for her
description: When Mosha, an elephant, was two years old, she lost her leg in a landmine injury along the Thai-Burmese border. Luckily, an orthopedic surgeon was able to fit her with the first prosthetic leg ever designed for an elephant. As she has grown, she has needed to be fitted for new ones. But she's never forgotten the doctor who changed her life.

title: He owns 3 pro sports teams all currently playing in bubbles
description: Ted Leonsis, whose Momentum Sports owns the NBA's Washington Wizards, NHL's Washington Capitols, and WNBA's Washington Mystics, joins CNN's John King to discuss how the bubble is working for pro sports teams.

title: Keilar chokes up talking about those who've died from Covid-19
description: CNN's Brianna Keilar becomes emotional while talking about those who have died from coronavirus and the families they've left behind.

title: See large chunk of glacier at risk of falling
description: Dozens of people have been evacuated from a valley in northern Italy amid fears that a section of ice the size of a football field could collapse from a glacier.

title: This is what an ER in Beirut was like after blast
description: CNN's Ben Wedeman reports on what conditions were like inside an ER in a hospital in Beirut, Lebanon, after an explosion in the Lebanese capital killed hundreds and injured thousands of people.

title: Trump adviser: Additional $600 is a disincentive to go back to work
description: Larry Kudlow, director of the National Economic Council, and CNN's Poppy Harlow get into a heated exchange over unemployment benefits.

title: Couple survives Beirut explosion less than 600 meters from blast site
description: A couple standing less than 600 meters from the blast site survived the explosion in Beirut - they are now recovering in hospital.

title: How 'The Matrix' is a trans story, according to Netflix and co-director
description: Netflix has posted a Twitter thread explaining the trans themes in "The Matrix," after one of its co-directors confirmed earlier this week that the movie was an allegory for gender transition.

title: Eurovision Song Contest is coming to America
description: One of the world's most popular singing competitions is headed to the United States.

title: Bulked up golfer snaps club after monster hit
description: Is Bryson DeChambeau now simply too strong and powerful for his own good? And beware Tiger Woods at the season's first major.

title: CNN political analyst: Biden is in a better position than Clinton ever was
description: CNN's senior political writer and analyst Harry Enten looks over brand new polls that show Joe Biden holding his lead over President Trump as the presidential election gets closer.

title: What is WeChat and why does Trump want to ban it?
description: President Donald Trump wants to ban WeChat, dramatically escalating tensions with China. But what is WeChat, and why is it so controversial?

title: How Miss Universe's historic win helped shift the status quo for beauty standards
description: Zozibini Tunzi, a Black woman with afro hair, grew up reading fashion and beauty magazines that did not contain images of women who looked like her. So when she was crowned Miss South Africa one year ago, Tunzi felt on top of the world.

title: 'Dirty Dancing' is getting a sequel
description: Because nobody puts Baby in a corner.

title: Super-rich families are buying multiple citizenships to prepare for the next lockdown
description: For most people, the coronavirus pandemic has meant fewer travel options. Not so for super-rich families who are increasingly using their money to cross borders that would otherwise be closed to them.

title: 'More than a Club?' How FC Barcelona 'lost its soul'
description: In recent times, mention Barcelona and the word "crisis" probably isn't too far behind.

title: China risks paying 'high cost' for South China Sea intimidation, Japan defense chief says
description: China's attempts to change the status quo in the South China Sea by force risks provoking a stern response from the international community, Japanese Defense Minister Taro Kono told CNN in an exclusive interview Friday.

title: Fugitive wanted by FBI since 1977 apprehended
description: After more than 40 years on the run and living under an alias, a prison escapee was apprehended Wednesday in New Mexico, the FBI said.

title: South Korean lawmaker's dress sparks feminist debate
description: A barrage of online abuse directed at a South Korean lawmaker over her choice of attire has sparked a debate in the East Asian nation, where women have long complained about sexism and a patriarchal culture.

title: Italy prepares to return to school ... with saws
Tencent just became Trump's new target in China tech war
description: Tencent just became the latest target in President Donald Trump's rapidly escalating tech war with China.

title: Mark Zuckerberg is now a centibillionaire
description: Mark Zuckerberg has joined the world's most exclusive club of the ultra rich.

title: Eyewitnesses describe deadly blast: You could have told me it was Hiroshima
description: A massive explosion rocked Lebanon's capital city on August 4, leaving scores of people dead and thousands wounded. Locals recount the scary moments of the blast.

title: Canadian citizen is second in two days to be sentenced to death in China on drug charges
description: A Canadian citizen in China has been sentenced to death for transporting and manufacturing illegal substances, a Chinese court announced Friday.

title: Sri Lanka's powerful Rajapaksa brothers claim landslide in parliamentary elections
description: Sri Lanka's ruling party has won a landslide victory in parliamentary elections, the country's Election Commission declared Friday, consolidating the Rajapaksa family's control on power.

title: China seals off village after bubonic plague death in Inner Mongolia
description: Authorities in the Chinese region of Inner Mongolia have sealed off a village after a resident there died from bubonic plague, a centuries-old disease responsible for the most deadly pandemic in human history.

title: Trump's dreams of a vaccine as his October Surprise aren't rooted in reality
description: President Donald Trump is desperately hoping to turn a Covid-19 vaccine, for which the entire world is longing, into his October Surprise.

title: Couple standing less than 600 meters from blast site survives Beirut explosion
description: The glass and debris from Tuesday's explosion in Beirut injured Imad Khalil and Lina Alameh, but both say they are lucky to be alive.

title: Scientists have unraveled the riddle of this real-life sea monster
description: For more than a hundred years, the fossil of the Tanystropheus has puzzled scientists.

title: Why 'negative partisanship' explains so many of America's political problems
description: A version of this article first appeared in the "Reliable Sources" newsletter. You can sign up for free right here.

title: Student featured in Netflix documentary on sexual assault dies by suicide
description: Daisy Coleman, whose allegation of sexual assault and ensuing harassment was chronicled in the Netflix documentary "Audrie and Daisy," died by suicide on Tuesday, her mother confirmed on Facebook. She was 23.

title: Trump issues executive order banning TikTok from operating in 45 days if it's not sold by Chinese parent company
description: President Donald Trump on Thursday issued an executive order that would ban the social media app TikTok from operating in the US in 45 days if it is not sold by its Chinese parent company ByteDance.

title: CNN's Chris Cuomo: Trump's judgment 'may be impaired'
description: CNN's Chris Cuomo discusses President Donald Trump's recent comment that presumptive Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden wants to "hurt God."

title: Alyssa Milano thought she was dying and tested positive for Covid-19 antibodies
description: Alyssa Milano says she has tested positive for coronavirus antibodies after having tested negative for Covid-19.

title: Actress Alyssa Milano: I don't know what to do in Covid-19 recovery
description: Alyssa Milano says she tested positive for coronavirus antibodies after having tested negative for Covid-19. The actress and activist joined CNN's Chris Cuomo to discuss her experience with infectious disease expert Dr. William Schaffner.

title: Michael Phelps: It's OK not to feel OK during a pandemic
description: Michael Phelps, the 23-time Olympic gold medalist, tells CNN's Anderson Cooper and Dr. Sanjay Gupta that keeping a routine and exercising every day has made all the difference in how he copes with the coronavirus pandemic.

title: 'Wonder Woman 1984' debuts new teaser
description: We're getting another glimpse at the upcoming "Wonder Woman 1984."
